description: To be fair, I'm mostly happy about being able to use PGP to encrypt passwords and to sync using Git over SSH. This is just a GUI, and not an incredible one at that. It is really `pass` that deserves the 5-star rating.
A simple, no-frills pass compatible app that just works. GUI needs a little bit of polish (the icon is shocking too) but hey it does the job well.
Was working good...then for some reason stopped launching. Was really handy while it was working.
Parece que tiene unos pequeños bugs, en especial para configurarlo. Ya pasando eso, funciona perfecto. Para complementarlo, passFF le queda bien en Firefox.
Toutes les fonctions attendues sont là le tout dans une grande stabilité.
